    • About Scott Hardesty


    Scott can best be described as a man of high energy with a passion for Nashville real estate. He is a professional with a strong desire to listen and understand his client’s particular needs. Scott’s market expertise coupled with his superior negotiating skills set him apart from the rest.

    For his buyer clients, Scott takes a keen interest in finding not only the ideal Nashville property but, more importantly, a property that proves to be priced fairly, with minimal risk, and optimal return on investment. For his seller clients, Scott uses his market knowledge to list the property at the right price, attracting many buyers and selling homes in the shortest amount of time. With the most comprehensive resources, services, and solutions available to make every transition as seamless as possible, Scott continues to provide assistance after the sale is closed.
